titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for inflation adjustments to the income threshold amounts applicable in determining the portion of social security benefits subject to tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an inflation adjustment after 1994 for income thresholds in determining the taxation of social security benefits.
